data_table.description: Menopause, Hormone Replacement and Ovary Removal through Generation 3 Exam 2. Data collected include cause of menopause, status of estrogen use and number of ovaries removed. Clinic exam questionnaires (coding and comments) were reviewed by a senior Framingham Heart Study MD. Results from the case review were recorded on data abstraction sheets. The criterion used to construct the list of cases to review was as follows: those women who reported periods stopped OR who used estrogen OR who used selective estrogen receptor modulator (SERM) OR who had one or two ovaries removed at either Exam 1 or Exam 2. There are women in this dataset that are not menopausal. Generation 3 cohort women who had menopause OR reported estrogen use OR reported selective estrogen receptor modulator (SERM) use OR had an ovary removal at either Exam 1 or Exam 2 are included in this dataset.

variable.name: STOPAGE
variable.description: Age When Periods Reported Stopped For One Year Or More
variable.comment: 10 - 19 = Range of values 20 - 29 = Range of values. 30 - 39 = Range of values. 40 - 49 = Range of values. 50 - 59 = Range of values.
variable.value: Periods not stopped or age unknown

variable.name: CAUSE
variable.value: Hormone use before reporting periods stopped

variable.name: EST1
variable.comment: See Clinic Exam 1 annotated form for e_exam_ex01_3_0086 to see variable G3A053 question configuration.
variable.value: Question not asked if periods not stopped

variable.name: SERM1
variable.description: Selective Estrogen Receptor Modulator Use At Exam 1
variable.comment: See Clinic Exam 1 annotated form for e_exam_ex01_3_0086 to see variable G3A065 question configuration.
variable.value: Question not asked if periods not stopped

variable.name: SERM2
variable.description: Selective Estrogen Receptor Modulator Use At Exam 2

variable.name: OVREM1
variable.description: Report Of Number Of Ovaries Removed At Exam 1
variable.comment: This variable represents number of ovaries removed at Exam 1 only. Sum OVREM 1 and OVREM 2 to get the total number of ovaries removed as of Clinic Exam 2.

variable.name: OVREM2
variable.description: Report Of Number Of Ovaries Removed At Exam 2
variable.comment: This variable represents number of ovaries removed Exam 2 only. Sum OVREM 1 and OVREM 2 to get the total number of ovaries removed as of Clinic Exam 2.
